name: 0 to X
summary: Based on a hit internet phenomenon, 0-to-X is an addictive puzzler developed by nemesys. In addition to tile mashing fun, the game features an amazing soundtrack by Memblers. Some of it is almost twenty years old too, finally seeing the light of day with this release. Flash saves will store your high scores for years to come, thanks to the capabilities of Memblersâ€™ Gtrom boards.

name: 0th floor.: The Cursed Elevator To Floor Zero
summary: You've been trapped in an elevator that always goes to the 0th floor. Don't overlook any anomalies, and try to move to the designated floors.
